product_name: Mountain Hardwear Trinity Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Trinity jacket is a completely waterproof soft-shell jacket. It keeps you dry while allowing comfortable mobility and good breathability while climbing, skinning or hiking. Dry.Q(TM) Core waterproof, breathable soft-shell fabric offers complete protection from the elements; all seams are sealed to ensure you stay dry. Helmet-compatible hood with single-pull adjustment and an extra-beefy brim protects your head in extreme weather. Pit zippers provide ventilation to help keep your body temperature regulated. Watertight front zipper with internal stormflap; chin guard protects sensitive skin from zipper chafe. Hem drawcord and cuffs adjust to seal out weather. Mountain Hardwear Trinity jacket has zip hand pockets and an internal stash pocket. Closeout.
